p: Furthermore, CCl 4-intoxicated rats showed a significant increase in the liver NO ( Table 3). This elevated NO indicates the stimulation of inflammatory cells and release of inflammatory cytokines [ 61]. NO participates in the induction of fibrosis through its reaction with superoxide anions forming highly reactive peroxynitrite radicals, which induce HSCs activation and accelerate the progression of liver fibrosis [ 56]. The obtained results closely agreed with those mentioned by Sagor et al. [ 62] and Abdel Salam et al. [ 63], who suggested the correlation between the hepatic NO content and the degree of liver fibrosis.
